20110117180405.000|20110117180406.000|CC1|FRACTURES.                      
20110117180406.000|20110117180406.000|CC1|THAT'S BASICALLY FRACTURES IN   
20110117180406.000|20110117180408.000|CC1|THE ROOF OF THE EYE SOCKET.     
20110117180408.000|20110117180409.000|CC1|FORTUNATELY ON THE LEFT THAT    
20110117180409.000|20110117180411.000|CC1|FRACTURE DOES NOT LOOK AS THOUGH
20110117180411.000|20110117180412.000|CC1|IT WILL NEED ANY KIND OF REPAIR.
20110117180412.000|20110117180415.000|CC1|ON THE RIGHT, HOWEVER, THE BONE 
20110117180415.000|20110117180416.000|CC1|FRAGMENTS FROM THAT FRACTURE    
20110117180416.000|20110117180417.000|CC1|WERE PUSHING DOWN ENOUGH ON THE 
20110117180417.000|20110117180423.000|CC1|EYE AND THE CONTENTS OF THE EYE 
20110117180423.000|20110117180424.000|CC1|SOCKET THAT THE DOCTOR ACTUALLY 
20110117180424.000|20110117180425.000|CC1|HAD TO PERFORM A VERY QUICK     
20110117180425.000|20110117180425.000|CC1|RELEASING INCISION AND          
20110117180425.000|20110117180427.000|CC1|OPERATION.                      
20110117180427.000|20110117180429.000|CC1|BUT WE DID NOT WANT TO DO THE   
20110117180429.000|20110117180430.000|CC1|FULL REPAIR AT THAT TIME.       
20110117180430.000|20110117180432.000|CC1|THE PATIENT AS YOU KNOW WAS     
20110117180432.000|20110117180436.000|CC1|VERY, VERY -- IN VERY, VERY     
20110117180436.000|20110117180436.000|CC1|CRITICAL CONDITION AT THAT TIME 
20110117180436.000|20110117180438.000|CC1|AND WE DID NOT WANT TO TAKE A   
20110117180438.000|20110117180440.000|CC1|CHANCE TO FURTHER EXACERBATE    
20110117180440.000|20110117180442.000|CC1|BRAIN SWELLING AND OTHER FACTORS
20110117180442.000|20110117180443.000|CC1|THAT COULD HAVE BEEN ADVERSELY  
20110117180443.000|20110117180444.000|CC1|AFFECTING HER.                  
20110117180444.000|20110117180447.000|CC1|SO WE PUT THAT OFF UNTIL AT SUCH
20110117180447.000|20110117180447.000|CC1|A TIME WE FELT SHE WAS THROUGH  
20110117180447.000|20110117180450.000|CC1|THAT CRITICAL PERIOD.           
20110117180450.000|20110117180453.000|CC1|AND AT ABOUT THE WEEK MARK IS   
20110117180453.000|20110117180455.000|CC1|WHEN WE FELT THAT WOULD BE      
20110117180455.000|20110117180455.000|CC1|RIGHT.                          
20110117180455.000|20110117180456.000|CC1|WE DID WANT TO GET TO THAT      
20110117180456.000|20110117180457.000|CC1|FRACTURE REPAIR WITHIN A        
20110117180457.000|20110117180459.000|CC1|REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME,      
20110117180459.000|20110117180501.000|CC1|WITHIN THE FIRST FEW WEEKS TO   
20110117180501.000|20110117180503.000|CC1|PREVENT COMPLICATIONS DOWN THE  
20110117180503.000|20110117180504.000|CC1|ROAD FROM THE PRESSURE ON THAT  
20110117180504.000|20110117180505.000|CC1|EYE SOCKET.                     
20110117180505.000|20110117180508.000|CC1|THE PROCEDURE ITSELF DID REQUIRE
20110117180508.000|20110117180511.000|CC1|A CRANE YOT MY, THAT'S OPENING A
20110117180511.000|20110117180513.000|CC1|WINDOW IN THE SKULL.            
20110117180513.000|20110117180516.000|CC1|IT DID REQUIRE THAT WE REMOVE   
20110117180516.000|20110117180517.000|CC1|THOSE BONE FRAGMENTS AND TAKE   
20110117180517.000|20110117180518.000|CC1|THE PRESSURE OFF.               
20110117180518.000|20110117180520.000|CC1|WE ACTUALLY RECONSTRUCTED THAT  
20110117180520.000|20110117180522.000|CC1|ROOF WITH A METAL MESH AND THEN 
20110117180522.000|20110117180524.000|CC1|WERE ABLE TO CLOSE UP.          
20110117180524.000|20110117180526.000|CC1|WE DID THIS ALL THROUGH AN      
20110117180526.000|20110117180527.000|CC1|INCISION JUST ABOVE THE EYEBROW 
20110117180527.000|20110117180529.000|CC1|SO WE SHOULD NOT HAVE TO        
20110117180529.000|20110117180532.000|CC1|REEXPOSE AND RISK THE LEFT SIDE 
20110117180532.000|20110117180533.000|CC1|OF THE BRAIN AND WE WANTED TO   
20110117180533.000|20110117180534.000|CC1|MINIMIZE THAT AS MUCH AS        
20110117180534.000|20110117180535.000|CC1|POSSIBLE.                       
20110117180535.000|20110117180539.000|CC1|I'M HAPPY TO SAY THAT WITHIN A  
20110117180539.000|20110117180539.000|CC1|FEW HOURS OF THE SURGERY, SHE   
20110117180539.000|20110117180540.000|CC1|WAS WAKING UP AND THROUGH THE   
20110117180540.000|20110117180542.000|CC1|WEEKEND SHE CAME BACK TO THE

20110117180547.000|20110117180548.000|CC1|BEEN HAVING WITH US AND THAT'S  
20110117180548.000|20110117180549.000|CC1|ALL VERY GOOD.                  
20110117180549.000|20110117180551.000|CC1|AT THIS TIME WE'RE HOPING TO

20110117180552.000|20110117180555.000|CC1|ENDS AND GETTING HER READY FOR  
20110117180555.000|20110117180557.000|CC1|THAT THIRD PHASE OF HER CARE,

20110117180601.000|20110117180606.000|CC1|>> SO PRIOR TO DR. LEMORE'S     
20110117180606.000|20110117180609.000|CC1|PROCEDURE, DR. RHEA AND MYSELF  
20110117180609.000|20110117180614.000|CC1|PERFORMED A TRACHIOSTOMY.       
20110117180614.000|20110117180616.000|CC1|THEY ALLOW US TO EXPEDITE THEIR 
20110117180616.000|20110117180619.000|CC1|CARE, PROVIDE THEM WITH ADEQUATE
20110117180619.000|20110117180620.000|CC1|NUTRITION, MANAGE THEIR AIRWAY  
20110117180620.000|20110117180621.000|CC1|IN A MUCH MORE COMFORTABLE      
20110117180621.000|20110117180622.000|CC1|MANNER.                         
20110117180622.000|20110117180623.000|CC1|THEREFORE THE TUBES THAT WERE IN
20110117180623.000|20110117180625.000|CC1|HER FACE ARE NO LONGER THERE AND
20110117180625.000|20110117180627.000|CC1|ARE NO LONGER NEEDED AND IT ALSO
20110117180627.000|20110117180630.000|CC1|DECREASES THE RISK OF INFECTION,
20110117180630.000|20110117180632.000|CC1|SINUSITIS, ASPIRATION, THOSE    
20110117180632.000|20110117180633.000|CC1|TYPES OF THINGS.                
20110117180633.000|20110117180635.000|CC1|SHE TOLL RATED THOSE PROCEDURES 
20110117180635.000|20110117180641.000|CC1|WELL, IN FACT WE DID THEM RIGHT 
20110117180641.000|20110117180649.000|CC1|BEFORE DR. --                   
20110117180649.000|20110117180652.000|CC1|>> THIS IS SOMETHING THAT'S     
20110117180652.000|20110117180654.000|CC1|GOING TO REQUIRE AN EXAMINATION.
20110117180654.000|20110117180655.000|CC1|OUR SUSPICION IS THAT SHE CAN   
20110117180655.000|20110117180657.000|CC1|SEE SOMETHING, BUT AT THIS POINT
20110117180657.000|20110117180658.000|CC1|A DETAILED EVALUATION HAS NOT   
20110117180658.000|20110117180700.000|CC1|BEEN PERFORMED.                 
20110117180700.000|20110117180703.000|CC1|>> NOW THAT THE BREATHING TUBES 
20110117180703.000|20110117180704.000|CC1|ARE OUT, CAN SHE SPEAK?         
20110117180704.000|20110117180706.000|CC1|>> WELL, YOU WANT TO COMMENT ON 
20110117180706.000|20110117180710.000|CC1|WHAT A TRACHIOSTOMY.            
20110117180710.000|20110117180714.000|CC1|>> THAT IS A BREATHING TUBE, IT 
20110117180714.000|20110117180719.000|CC1|GOES INTO A SURGICALLY PRAYSED  
20110117180719.000|20110117180722.000|CC1|INCISION IN HER NECK.           
20110117180722.000|20110117180723.000|CC1|THE ONE WE HAVE IN PLACE NOW    
20110117180723.000|20110117180725.000|CC1|DOES NOT ALLOW HER TO GET AIR   
20110117180725.000|20110117180727.000|CC1|PAST HER VOCAL CORDS SO SHE     
20110117180727.000|20110117180730.000|CC1|CANNOT VOCALIZE, BUT SHE        
20110117180730.000|20110117180731.000|CC1|CERTAINLY COULD MOUTH WORDS OR  
20110117180731.000|20110117180732.000|CC1|SOMETHING LIKE THAT WHEN SHE'S  
20110117180732.000|20110117180733.000|CC1|READY TO DO THAT.               
20110117180733.000|20110117180739.000|CC1|>> AS FAR AS HER HUSBAND MARK   
20110117180739.000|20110117180741.000|CC1|KELLY, WHO WE OBVIOUSLY KNOW

20110117180752.000|20110117180752.000|CC1|THERE.                          
20110117180752.000|20110117180755.000|CC1|BUT IT DOES IMPLY THAT SHE IS   
20110117180755.000|20110117180757.000|CC1|RECOGNIZING HIM AND THAT SHE'S  
20110117180757.000|20110117180758.000|CC1|INTERACTING IN AN OLD FAMILIAR  
20110117180758.000|20110117180759.000|CC1|WAY WITH HIM.                   
20110117180759.000|20110117180801.000|CC1|>> AND WHAT DOES THAT MEAN FROM 
20110117180801.000|20110117180803.000|CC1|A MEDICAL STAND POINT IN HER    
20110117180803.000|20110117180803.000|CC1|RECOVERY?                       
20110117180803.000|20110117180805.000|CC1|>> AGAIN, ALL THOSE HIGHER

20110117180808.000|20110117180810.000|CC1|AT LEAST SOMEHOW, SOMEWHAT

20110117180815.000|20110117180816.000|CC1|LAST YEAR THAT SHE WAS OPENING  
20110117180816.000|20110117180819.000|CC1|HER EYES WITH MORE FREQUENCY AND
20110117180819.000|20110117180821.000|CC1|MAKING COMMON MOVEMENTS, IS SHE 
20110117180821.000|20110117180821.000|CC1|STILL DOING IS THAT.            
20110117180821.000|20110117180824.000|CC1|>> SHE'S AT THE SAME BASELINE   
20110117180824.000|20110117180827.000|CC1|THAT SHE WAS BEFORE THE SURGERY.
20110117180827.000|20110117180832.000|CC1|>> YOU WERE CALLING HER RECOVERY
20110117180832.000|20110117180834.000|CC1|MIRACULOUS, NOW WHAT WOULD YOU  
20110117180834.000|20110117180834.000|CC1|SAY?                            
20110117180834.000|20110117180835.000|CC1|>> THAT WORD STILL HOLDS UP VERY
20110117180835.000|20110117180838.000|CC1|WELL.                           
20110117180838.000|20110117180838.000|CC1|[ INAUDIBLE ]                   
20110117180838.000|20110117180839.000|CC1|>> THE NEXT MAJOR STEP IS THE   
20110117180839.000|20110117180843.000|CC1|GRADUATION TO REHABILITATION.

20110117184415.000|20110117184416.000|CC1|IT WAS WHAT 2008 REPRESENTED,   
20110117184416.000|20110117184419.000|CC1|ABOUT WHO WE REALLY WERE.       
20110117184419.000|20110117184422.000|CC1|AND SIMILARLY, DR. KING IS AN   
20110117184422.000|20110117184423.000|CC1|INCREDIBLE LEADER, BUT OFTEN    
20110117184423.000|20110117184425.000|CC1|DURING THE CIVIL RIGHTS         
20110117184425.000|20110117184426.000|CC1|MOVEMENT, DR. KING WOULD SHOW UP
20110117184426.000|20110117184428.000|CC1|WITH THE CAMERAS AND WITH THE   
20110117184428.000|20110117184430.000|CC1|NATIONAL ATTENTION AFTER LOCAL  
20110117184430.000|20110117184431.000|CC1|LEADERS HAD ALREADY LAID THE    
20110117184431.000|20110117184433.000|CC1|GROUND WORK, THAT IT WAS PART OF
20110117184433.000|20110117184436.000|CC1|WHAT HE CONTRIBUTED TO THE      
20110117184436.000|20110117184437.000|CC1|MOVEMENT WAS THE SIZE OF HIS

20110117185154.000|20110117185155.000|CC1|TOMORROW?                       
20110117185155.000|20110117185157.000|CC1|>> TOMORROW, WE'RE TALKING ABOUT
20110117185157.000|20110117185159.000|CC1|THE EFFORT BY HOUSE REPUBLICANS 
20110117185159.000|20110117185202.000|CC1|TO REPELL THE HEALTH CARE LAW.  
20110117185202.000|20110117185204.000|CC1|THIS IS A CAMPAIGN PROMISE MADE 
20110117185204.000|20110117185207.000|CC1|ON THE MIDTERM ELECTIONS TRAIL  
20110117185207.000|20110117185208.000|CC1|BY PLENTY OF PEOPLE WHO ARE     
20110117185208.000|20110117185209.000|CC1|MEMBERS OF THE HOUSE OF         
20110117185209.000|20110117185212.000|CC1|REPRESENTATIVES TO REPEAL THE   
20110117185212.000|20110117185213.000|CC1|ENTIRE HEALTH CARE LAW THAT THE 
20110117185213.000|20110117185214.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS AND PRESIDENT OBAMA,  
20110117185214.000|20110117185216.000|CC1|IN PARTICULAR, PUSHED VERY HARD 
20110117185216.000|20110117185218.000|CC1|TO GET PAST.                    
20110117185218.000|20110117185219.000|CC1|NOW, THERE'S SOME QUESTION AS TO
20110117185219.000|20110117185222.000|CC1|WHETHER THIS EFFORT IS EVEN --  
20110117185222.000|20110117185224.000|CC1|SHOULD IT EVEN BE DONE IN THE   
20110117185224.000|20110117185228.000|CC1|WAKE OF THE TRAGEDY IN TUCSON.  
20110117185228.000|20110117185230.000|CC1|BUT ALSO BECAUSE PRETTY MUCH THE
20110117185230.000|20110117185232.000|CC1|CONVENTIONAL WISDOM IS, THIS    
20110117185232.000|20110117185234.000|CC1|REPEAL COULD POSSIBLY PASS THE  
20110117185234.000|20110117185237.000|CC1|HOUSE, BUT IT WILL GET OVER TO  
20110117185237.000|20110117185238.000|CC1|THE SENATE WHERE IT WILL        
20110117185238.000|20110117185240.000|CC1|PROBABLY DIE, BECAUSE THE       
20110117185240.000|20110117185241.000|CC1|DEMOCRATS STILL CONTROL THE     
20110117185241.000|20110117185242.000|CC1|SENATE.                         
20110117185242.000|20110117185243.000|CC1|EVEN IF IT WERE TO MAKE IT      
20110117185243.000|20110117185244.000|CC1|THROUGH THE SENATE, IT WOULD GET
20110117185244.000|20110117185246.000|CC1|TO THE PRESIDENT'S DESK WHERE IT
20110117185246.000|20110117185248.000|CC1|IS VIRTUALLY ASSURED TO GET A   
20110117185248.000|20110117185251.000|CC1|PRESIDENTIAL VETO.
